import React from 'react'; const TermsAndConditions = () => { return (

Terms and Conditions

By accessing or using our website, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with any part, please do not use our services.

1. User Eligibility

Users must be at least 18 years old or of legal age in their jurisdiction to use this platform.

2. Account Responsibility

You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.

3. Game Rules

Each game on the platform has its own rules. Users must read and follow those rules to avoid disqualification.

4. Payments

Payments and withdrawals may be subject to third-party processing times, fees, and regulations.

5. Acceptable Use

Users agree not to engage in unlawful, abusive, or unauthorized activity such as cheating or attempting to reverse-engineer the platform.

6. Suspension

We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms or engage in suspicious activity.

7. Limitation of Liability

We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages resulting from the use of our services.

8. Changes to Terms

These terms may be updated periodically. Continued use of the service constitutes acceptance of any changes.

); }; export default TermsAndConditions;
